<h3><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Verdana";font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p> </o:p></span></h3>

<h3><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Verdana"'>Course Description<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:12.0pt'>In many business and industry
application domains handling and processing of digital images is a basic and
important component. This spans an extremely wide range of applications from
digital content creation and management for web-based applications over medical
imaging, digital photography, digital print and publishing to real-time 3D
graphics in simulations and computer games. The widespread use of digital-image
content makes it possible <span class=GramE>to effectively communicate</span>
visual results. This course prepares students in the fundamentals of digital
image processing as used in various applications as outlined above and
illustrates the various effects one can achieve with digital images and how to
extract fundamental information. </p>

<h3><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Verdana"'>Prerequisite <o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:12.0pt'><span class=GramE>ICS 23/CSE23,
ICS6A/Math6A and Math6C/Math3A with grades of C or better.</span></p>

<h3><span style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Verdana"'>Outline of the <span
class=SpellE>Syllabus</span> <o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Linear Systems and
     Decomposition of Signals </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Convolution and Properties </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Edge Detection, <span
     class=SpellE>Crispening</span> </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Correlation and Feature
     Detection </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Discrete Fourier Transform
     and its Properties, Spectral <span class=SpellE>Ananlysis</span>, Fourier
     Pairs </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Continuous Signal Processing </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Digital Filtering and Noise
     Cleaning </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Image Sampling,
     Reconstruction, Resampling and Quantization </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Image Enhancement and
     Histogram Processing </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Geometric Image Operations </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Morphological Image
     Processing </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Image Segmentation </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Color Models </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     mso-list:l3 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in'>Image Compression </li>
</ul>
